description:
## OpenStack Controller - Overview

Preset dashboard for the OpenStack Controller integration. Used for OpenStack deployments v13 and higher. 

[See integration docs for more details](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/openstack_controller/)
title: OpenStack Controller Overview [Default Microversion]

definition.content:
This dashboard provides an overview of your Openstack deployment. Track the health of your Nova, Neutron, Ironic, and Octavia services and view key information such as:
- hypervisor load and status 
- server details and errors 
- status of bare metal nodes 
- load balancer service health

Make sure to scope your dashboard to the `keystone_server_url` of your Openstack deployment as well as the `region` that you would like to see data for. You can additionally drill down into specific servers, hypervisors, and more.

**Further Reading on Openstack**

[Datadog Openstack Controller Integration Docs ↗]( https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/openstack_controller/)

[Openstack Docs  ↗]( https://www.openstack.org/)

[Openstack Services  ↗](https://www.openstack.org/software/project-navigator/openstack-components#openstack-services)

View the status and health of all of the Compute services in your Openstack deployment. Quickly identify which services are in maintenance mode and on what host they are running, so you know exactly where to troubleshoot an error in your environment.
View important server diagnostic information such as VM disk read and write requests and memory availability.

definition.title: Max Retries and Max Retries Down
